column3: Gains [currentValue] + [value] chance to evade enemy damage.
Adds [currentValue] + [value] chance to cause enemies to bleed for [currentSecValue] + [secValue] per second.
Adds [currentValue] + [value] chance to create a chain lightning that jumps to nearby targets. Damages them for [currentSecValue] + [secValue].
Attacks explode on impact. Damages enemies in an area for [currentValue] + [value].
Gain [currentValue] + [value] of your damage dealt as health.
Hold and release MOUSE2 to perform a special attack.
Adds [currentValue] + [value] chance to block enemy damage.
Adds [currentValue] + [value] chance to cause enemies to bleed for [secValue] per second.
